name: Full-Stack Web
description: In this course you will learn full stack web development, first learning all about the frontend with HTML/CSS/JS/Vue and then the backend with Node.js/Express/MongoDB

school.name: Coding Academy
school.description: Coding Academy is a full stack JavaScript Bootcamp located in the heart of Israel that focuses on the technologies you need to get a high paying job as a web developer. This course will provide you with all of the essentials to become a successful frontend web developer. You will learn to master HTML, CSS and front end JavaScript, along with tools like Git, VSCode and front end frameworks like Vue

name: Consultants Course
description: Organizational consulting studies will train you to help organizations in a way that helps them realize their vision in the most efficient and correct way. For this complex training, you will learn a variety of organizational related topics during the course: Organizational Behavior, Management, Human Resource Management, Organizational Theories.

school.name: The Richard DeVos
school.description: Values ​​and Philosophy First and foremost, DeVos values ​​its students and their development. Our graduates emerge as leaders, managers, and entrepreneurs fully understanding the importance of a market economy driven by individual freedom, choice, and responsibility.

name: Ecommerce Course
description: The global tide of e-commerce (online stores) does not miss Israel either. As part of this revolution, new and sought-after professions were created, and more and more companies and organizations are required to make adjustments and build a strategic plan that incorporates classic sales practices and e-commerce usage - in order to capture greater market share.

school.name: Hasifa
school.description: Hasifa The School of Communication and Digital Arts was established some 30 years ago as part of the Open University's foreign studies program and is considered a leader and pioneer in training professionals to meet changing industry requirements.

name: Graphic Design
description: John Bryce Training presents an innovative course in Graphic Design, Computer Graphics and Visual Communication, plus web and mobile design. In addition, the course emphasizes web design and application design studies, focusing on the design principles and practices of the graphic and digital media world.

school.name: John Bryce
school.description: John Bryce Training, Matrix's training arm, is the leading training company in Israel and in Europe in the field of computer training and information technology and in the field of management, service and sales skills training. John Bryce has 3 training centers in Israel and other centers in Europe.

name: Data Science Course
description: This course prepares you for data research roles. Processing of databases with many information, optimization and analysis tools in development tools, statistical tools and various models. Building algorithms that allow the system to learn on its own, contracts future behavior and defines the action to be performed accordingly. This is basically the basis of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (AI) systems.

school.name: Experis Academy
school.description: Experis Academy runs the leading high-tech training and retraining program. The program runs over a decade, during which we trained over 1,300 outstanding software and analytics developers for high-tech and industry-leading startups. Graduates of the program, selected from thousands of applicants who undergo rigorous, personal and professional screening, undergo intensive training that gives them in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience that greatly contributes to their effectiveness in organizational roles.

name: Management Course
description: A management course or managerial course, will assist the manager in developing and acquiring tools for effective, up-to-date management practices that will guide him in day-to-day processes, decision making, employee management and more - in the business and public sectors, with personal development and the acquisition of personal and interpersonal skills that will facilitate executives in managing their roles.

school.name: Gishot
school.description: The Gishot Group to Excellence engraved the value of excellence on its banner, The People Make a Difference. Mainly engaged in the training, training and coaching of behavioral skills for teams in organizations and the general public.

name: Interior Design Course
description: Studio 6B's interior design course is an up-to-date and unique course of its kind, and was specifically designed to prepare you for the variety of challenges facing the new designer today. It is important to note that the method of learning in the course of interior design is constantly updated and updated, just like the design industry itself.

school.name: Studio 6B
school.description: Studio 6B was established in 2000 by architects and designers Amir Navon and Michael Ben-Gan, as a School of Design Studies and as a center for the advancement of design professions in Israel.

name: Chef Course

school.name: Study.com
school.description: Associate's and bachelor's degree programs combine general education, core culinary and elective content. Aside from cooking classes, the curriculum may address nutrition, food and beverage management, wine studies and food science. Non-credit, standalone chef courses are commonly offered through community colleges, culinary schools and specialty stores. Unless noted, no prior education or experience is required. Courses may be divided among beginner, intermediate and advanced levels or demonstration versus hands-on.

description: This beginning cooking and chef course introduces students to the equipment found in professional kitchens and methods for preparing quality food. Students learn basic cooking terms and procedures for preparing meals for large numbers of people. In addition to kitchen safety and sanitation procedures, students prepare soups, sauces, meats, poultry and seafood. Students may take this class several times; each term emphasizes a different type of cuisine or ingredient.
